name: Platfarm Defense
description:
Defend your "Platfarm" from waves of enemies. Harvest your crops to earn money; spend that money on defenses and MORE CROPS!! You lose if all your crops die.

This game is a: Tower-defense, Platformer, Farming-sim

Hold down the "left shift" key to enter interaction mode, from which you can build, harvest and re-plant your crops, and upgrade your scarecrows.

Yes you can build anywhere you click- I didn't have time to implement a system for snapping new objects to the ground etc. So scarecrows and crops can hover mid-air, just like real life ;D.

Planning to add more quality of life features, such as an indicator for where enemies will be spawning, and of course a settings menu.

Hope you enjoy playing and please let me know what you think!

If you're playing the Webgl version, you can press "p" to pause instead of "escape" to avoid exiting fullscreen.
